subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage-based, up to 5x more usage than free users, with higher limits during peak hours.
Usage-based with higher limits and priority access during high traffic.
Part of Google One AI Premium, includes 1TB of storage and Gemini integration across Google apps.

llama_3.cost_model: Hardware costs (cloud/virtual/on-prem) + 700M+ MAU commercial license required for large-scale distribution.

copilot_pro.enterprise_pricing: Contact Sales (bundled with Microsoft 365 Copilot for $30/user/month)
copilot_pro.model_access: GPT-4 Turbo during non-peak times, latest models including GPT-4o, image creation with DALL-E 3.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High; $20/month has become the standard price point for premium consumer access across major providers.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price competition driven by new, highly efficient models. There's a clear market bifurcation: flagship models (GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet) around $5-$15/M tokens, and ultra-efficient, fast models (Gemini 1.5 Flash, Claude 3 Haiku) priced below $1/M tokens for input. Output costs are also falling but remain significantly higher than input costs.
